title: Noel Gallagher says he won't go to brother Liam's wedding
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

That long-awaited Oasis reunion is still quite some way off.

Noel Gallagher won't be attending brother Liam's wedding, despite his former bandmate extending an invite.

Last month, Liam said he would pop a "little envelope" through Noel's door at the request of mum Peggy – despite the brothers feuding for a decade since Oasis disbanded.

Noel scoffed: "He didn't invite me to his previous four weddings, so I'm not going to go to this one."

Liam's upcoming nuptials to fiancee Debbie Gwyther will actually be his third wedding.

Speaking at the BMI Awards at London's Savoy, Noel revealed plans to preserve a special part of himself – his haircut.

(Image: Getty)

"When I die at the age of 104, I am going to freeze this hair do, and that will stay in the universe forever," he claims.

Before that, he's planning to enjoy his 50s, confirming plans to sell off his publishing rights to Oasis' back catalogue.

Noel said: "I’m gonna buy two private jets. Just to piss off the f***ing eco warriors."

(Image: Getty)

Liam responded to Noel’s comments, saying: "We all have the ability to forgive and forget you've just got to want to.

"We all know you’re desperate to hang out with your little bro."
description: Noel Gallagher won't be attending his brother's wedding
